item.title: Apple standing up for its customers' privacy
item.description:
Apple standing up for its customers' privacy

Good profile by Brad Stone, Adam Satariano, and Gwen Ackerman, with some interesting details about the iPad Pro's original schedule and Srouji's background. A little over a year ago, Apple had a problem: The iPad Pro was behind schedule. Elements of the hardware, software, and accompanying stylus weren't going to be ready for a release in the spring.
